mapper.insert: insert into t_goods (goods_id, goods_category, goods_name, goods_price, goods_sales_amount, goods_image, t_store_store_id, t_category_category_id) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{goodsSalesAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tStoreStoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tCategoryCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_goods set goods_category = #{goodsCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, goods_sales_amount = #{goodsSalesAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_image = #{goodsImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_store_store_id = #{tStoreStoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, t_category_category_id = #{tCategoryCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_category, goods_name, goods_price, goods_sales_amount, goods_image, t_store_store_id, t_category_category_id from t_goods where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select goods_id, goods_category, goods_name, goods_price, goods_sales_amount, goods_image, t_store_store_id, t_category_category_id from t_goods
select goods_id, goods_category, goods_name, goods_price, goods_sales_amount, goods_image, t_store_store_id, t_category_category_id from t_goods where t_store_store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select goods_id, goods_category, goods_name, goods_price, goods_sales_amount, goods_image, t_store_store_id, t_category_category_id from t_goods where t_category_category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
